thread.title: Asian elephant skin trade growing, warns UK charity

title: Asian elephant skin trade growing, warns UK charity
text:
Asian elephant skin trade growing, warns UK charity 1:34am IST - 00:53
A conservation charity says a growing number of Asian elephants, which appears greatest in Myanmar, are being killed not only for their tusks, but also their skin. Roselle Chen reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A conservation charity says a growing number of Asian elephants, which appears greatest in Myanmar, are being killed not only for their tusks, but also their skin. Roselle Chen reports.
